name: Uncharted Sea
description: Dive through the endless survival journey and explore immersive uncharted sea. There is just you and your will to survive. Use your special skills to escape from hungry predators. Deep water is a dangerous place, sometimes most beautiful and colorful creatures could be deadly, don't get tricked by these types of jellyfish, they can also go invisible! Try to predict your every movement. Although uncharted sea is a challenging place to survive, there are creatures which will help you through your adventure. If you spot a white jellyfish, try to get on top of it, it will give you oxygen and sanctuary from all the predators.
